transcript:
Customer: Hello.
Hello?
Executive: Hello. Ji Yogesh ji.
Customer: Haan.
Executive: Yogesh ji baat kar rahe hain na?
Customer: Hello. Haan bol do bol do.
Executive: Hello. Ji ji boliye. Haan haan bol do. Mere ko complaint karna tha mere sath thoda India mart ne ye thoda ye kiya hai to mera paisa hai na. Ji. Wo mere ko jyada liya hai mere se. Ji. Ji. To main abhi aapke uske pehle unse bhi baat kiya. Ji. To mere ko paisa refund chahiye aur mere ko plan cancel karwana hai mere se.
Mera baki ka refund chahiye.
Executive: Theek hai to abhi to na main lunch pe hoon to 2 se 3 phir main ek bar check karke aapko call back karta hoon, theek hai?
Okay sir.
summary:
Concerns:

- Complaint regarding IndiaMART.

- Wants refund of money.

- Wants plan cancellation.

- Wants remaining refund.



Resolution:

- Executive will check and call back between 2 to 3 after lunch.



Next Steps: 

Issue not resolved. Executive will call back between 2 to 3 after checking.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

Neutral to demanding.



@@@Key Topics:

refund, plan cancellation, complaint
